meanings.sent1: The pulsatory music made everyone want to dance.
meanings.sent2: The pulsatory beat of the drum echoed through the room.
meanings.sent3: The pulsatory sound of the clock ticking seemed to match the rhythm of our hearts.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a pulsatory melody filling the air.
meanings.sent5: The pulsatory waves of the ocean lulled me to sleep.

meanings.definition: Having a pulsating or throbbing motion.
meanings.sent1: The pulsatory engine of the car hummed as it idled.
meanings.sent2: His pulsatory headache made it hard to concentrate.
meanings.sent3: The pulsatory dance moves of the robot were surprisingly graceful.
meanings.sent4: The pulsatory glow of the fireflies lit up the night.
meanings.sent5: The pulsatory sensation in her chest made her worry.

meanings.sent1: The pulsatory device emitted a soft, rhythmic hum.
meanings.sent2: The pulsatory strings of the guitar created a soothing melody.
meanings.sent3: The pulsatory phone case vibrated with each notification.
meanings.sent4: The pulsatory colors of the light show danced across the stage.
meanings.sent5: The pulsatory energy in the room was palpable.
